content.rendered:
Land Donation

The Land Donation of GEOKC is a project which includes all selected international branches of GEOKC to proceed by geographical location, including all different locations one-by-one to request Seva (donation). GEOKC of MN is the first branch to start the project. And to complete this project, GEOKC Campaigns team members are spreading all around the world including:

  • United States
  • India
  • Canada
  • United Kingdom
  • Names of other countries coming soon

The Land Donation of GEOKC is a major and necessary giving area to locate and construct the new buildings of GEOKC all over the world.

International Prayer Centers of GEOKC

To get opportunities in Land Donation areas, please contact GEOKC Capital Campaign Teams (Team Three):
612-540-9651
batheja.sunita@gmail.com
